name: UploadAndProcessStockJSONFile
description: Upload stock JSON (delta)file. The service processes the data async.This service is intended for small files (up to 5MB). Please view the documentation for processing larger files.

properties.name: Data
properties.description:
Should be a JSON formatted array of object with these 3 properties;

- `ProductID` (optional, int)
- `ProductBackendID` (optional, string)
- `QuantityOnHand` (required, int, value >= 0)

Mutation will only be processed for valid ProductID's or ProductBackendID's. In case ProductID and ProductBackendID are provided,
ProductBackendID will be selected as the search parameter.

properties.name: EmailAddress
properties.description: An email address to mail the processing result to. When left empty, the logged in user context will be used

properties.name: IsFullStockMutationFile
properties.description:
If set to false (default), only the stock for the products that are present in the file will be updated (delta).

If set to true, all the products will be updated - products not present in the file will be updated to quantity 0.
